Generated Narrative: ValueSet iop-methods

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 164729009 (Tonometry)
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/uv/eyecare/CodeSystem/iop-methods

name: OphthalmologyIOPMethods
title: Intraocular pressure (IOP) method valueset
description: Describes the various methods of capturing IOP that relate to the IOP Observation profile
